item.title: XO Offers Business Continuity Planning Guide
item.description: XO Communications, a significant player in the competitive telecom industry, offers a useful resource in their Business Continuity Planning Guide. But what exactly is business continuity, and how does it relate to telecommunications? Think of it as disaster recovery, a term we’re all familiar with. We’ve all encountered setbacks in our lives, whether it’s a robbery that wipes out our work computers, a flood that ruins important documents, or simply losing a smartphone with valuable data.
